title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it beeps. Furthermore, clicking on other buttons also produces the bell sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, it should not beep. Clicking on other buttons should not produce the bell sound.
SR:
1. Launch ControlExampleText.
2. Choose SWT.MULTI from the options.
3. Observe that it beeps.
4. Click on other buttons and note if the bell sound is produced.
